string.name: cwt_sign_in_cwtg_and_active_txt
string.Data:
Welcome to the new myCWT! We’ve redesigned and enhanced our award-winning app to better serve your on-the-go needs.

Plus, the password you use to access the CWT Portal website is now your CWT Account password, allowing you to access myCWT AND CWT Portal with the same password!

Note: Your previous myCWT password is no longer valid.

string.name: cwt_sign_in_cwtg_and_inactive_txt
string.Data:
Welcome to the new myCWT! We’ve redesigned and enhanced our award-winning app to better serve your on-the-go needs.

To access myCWT, please register for a new CWT Account. It only takes a few minutes and once set-up is complete, you can use the same email address and password to access myCWT and your CWT Portal website!


Choose a password:

string.name: cwt_sign_in_error_page_txt_unkonwn_user
string.Data:
We’re Sorry!

We were unable to find your email address. Please validate the email entered is correct and try again.

If the email entered is correct, your travel profile configuration does not enable use of myCWT.

Additional information and instructions have been sent to your email address.

Be sure to check your spam or junk mail filter if you do not find the email in your inbox.

string.name: cwt_sign_in_error_page_txt
string.Data:
Dear Traveler,

Your current travel profile configuration does not enable use of myCWT. Additional information and instructions have been sent to your email address.

Be sure to check your spam or junk mail filter if you don’t find the email in your inbox.

string.name: cwt_sign_in_no_cwtg_and_active_txt
string.Data:
Welcome to myCWT!

To get started, please enter your CWT Account password, which is the password you use to access your CWT Portal website.

Please enter your CWT Account password

string.name: cwt_sign_in_no_cwtg_and_inactive_txt
string.Data:
Welcome to the new myCWT!

To get started, please register for a CWT Account. It only takes a few minutes and once set-up is complete, you can use the same email address and password to access myCWT and your CWT Portal website!


Choose a password:

string.name: cwt_sign_in_uset_sign_in_again_txt
string.Data:
Welcome!

Please enter your CWT Account password

The International Date Line (IDL) is an imaginary line on the surface of the Earth that passes through the middle of the Pacific Ocean. Locations to the west of the IDL are one calendar day ahead of locations to the east of the line. To accommodate, A traveler crossing the IDL from east to west, as your travel plans dictates, subtracts one day.

string.Data: By completing this reservation, I acknowledge that I have read and understood the cancellation policy for this rate.

resources.string: I am aware that payment for this reservation is paid to the hotelier directly upon checkout and that if I do not arrive for my reservation and/or do not cancel this reservation outside of the cancellation policy terms I will be liable to pay any cancellation fee penalties due to the hotelier.
